comments.description: Now that we’ve set the ball rolling with our first small App,
comments.name: Tracy Morgan

replies.description: let’s focus on your three travel mates: match, location and history.

comments.description: It’s breaking because we’re trying to access state.count, but state is undefined. Redux expected our reducer function to return a value for state, except that it (implicitly) returned undefined. Things are rightfully broken.

comments.description: It is an example to reset the state of the form. Unlike clear, reset restores the initial value. There are two ways to reset the state.
